ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Another issue...
ygData.msgSnippet: Bonesnatcher said 8.1 made his computer run really slow.  He does not have SoL yet either.  He uninstalled 8.1 last night and reinstalled 8.0a and he said 8.0a
ygData.messageBody:
Bonesnatcher said 8.1 made his computer run really slow. He does not have
SoL yet either. He uninstalled 8.1 last night and reinstalled 8.0a and he
said 8.0a worked a lot better.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 8:51 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Another issue...


So, which one is it? Do I need directx8.0 or directx8.1? I still do not have
SoL yet, but I should have it by weeks end, BUT I want to log onto EQ to
check and see if Dain has spawned in Icewell Keep. I've been waiting for
over a week now to see this short little sob and he has yet to show his
face. I need him to spawn to complete my 9th Coldain Ring quest. On my way
out to work this morning I was going to see if Dain was up, so I tried to
log in real fast, but I couldn't get the patch to start. I didn't have any
time to play EQ last night. Yesterday at work, I tore myself away from my
work and emailed to my home address DirectX8 and my newest sound and video
drivers. I just need to install them now.

Ok, so now for my question, is the reason I couldn't log on this morning
because I have not downloaded DirectX yet? If so, which DirectX do I need
8.0 or 8.1?

Thanks for the help! My gnome warrior thanks you also!

Sistily


-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [SMTP:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 7:37 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Another issue...

At 06:25 AM 12/5/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>Well there has to be a date where things change. 12/03 and 12/04
was the
>date.

No, what I meant was that he made the EXACT statement on the third
that DX
8.0 was still supported, then less than 24 hours changed his words
without
explanation.

I feel bad for anyone who prepurchased a SOL paperweight.

Talies the Wanderer
